name: ipfs-css
description: The single-purpose css class names and @font-face config to IPFS up your UI.

scripts.build:fonts: mkdir -p fonts; rsync -a --exclude='MontserratAlt*' --exclude='*.woff' --exclude='*.eot' --exclude='*.otf' src/fonts/inter-ui/docs/font-files/ src/fonts/montserrat/fonts/webfonts/ fonts
scripts.build:licenses: cp src/fonts/inter-ui/LICENSE.txt fonts/Inter-UI-LICENSE.txt; cp src/fonts/montserrat/OFL.txt fonts/Montserrat-LICENSE.txt;
scripts.deploy:docs: rsync -av --delete icons docs/; ipfs add -r -Q docs

author: olizilla
